data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Hirotaka Mita for Tokyo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 1, Jumpei Iida awards Kashima a goal kick.
Throw-in Kashima.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo's Kensuke Nagai gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Tokyo are coming forward and Shuto Abe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
Jumpei Iida signals a Tokyo throw-in in Kashima's half.
Important block from the Tokyo defence as Leo Silva fires in a strike for Kashima.
In the minute 7, Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Tokyo have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 9, Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
In the minute 13, Tokyo attack but Tsuyoshi Watanabe's header doesn't find the target.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 14, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo are pushing forward but Kensuke Nagai's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
In the minute 16, Kashima drive upfield and Everaldo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 19, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Tokyo.
In the minute 21, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 22, Kensuke Nagai (Tokyo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Jumpei Iida awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Hirotaka Mita of Tokyo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick Tokyo.
In the minute 27, Juan Alano is booked for the home team.
In Kashima Tokyo drive forward through Masato Morishige. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kashima.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kashima to check on Kwoun Suntae, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 33, Kashima's Kwoun Suntae looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Kashima's area.
Kashima's Everaldo scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 34, Rikuto Hirose instrumental with a fine assist.
Jumpei Iida signals a Tokyo throw-in in Kashima's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Shuto Abe for Tokyo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kashima.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Shuto Abe is back on the pitch.
In the minute 40, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 42, Kashima drive upfield at Kashima Soccer Stadium and Koki Machida hits the bar with a header.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 43, Kashima push upfield but Jumpei Iida quickly pulls them for offside.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Diego Oliveira (Tokyo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
The first half has been concluded at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 45, Goal! Tokyo draw level to 1-1 through a Tsuyoshi Watanabe header.
That's a fine assist from Hirotaka Mita.
Goal! A Masato Morishige header gives Tokyo a 1-2 lead in Kashima.
In the minute 45, Great play from Hirotaka Mita to set up the goal.
The second half has started at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 46, Kashima's Everaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tokyo's half?
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Tokyo's Shuto Abe breaks free at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jumpei Iida awards Kashima a goal kick.
Kashima's Yasushi Endo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Tokyo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Kento Misao (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 53, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Tokyo needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Kenta Hasegawa (Tokyo) is making a first substitution, with Kazuya Konno replacing Takuya Uchida.
Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Adailton replacing Hirotaka Mita.
Kashima's Yasushi Endo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 56, In Kashima Tokyo attack through Diego Oliveira. The finish is off target, however.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adailton of Tokyo gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
In the minute 60, Yasushi Endo (Kashima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 63, Throw-in high up the field for Tokyo in Kashima.
Jumpei Iida awards Kashima a goal kick.
Kashima surge into the attack at Kashima Soccer Stadium but Tomoya Inukaiâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Tokyo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Taichi Hara is replacing Kensuke Nagai for Tokyo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced Juan Alano with Ryuji Izumi. This is the first substitution made today by Zago.
The home team replace Sho Ito with Shoma Doi.
In the minute 68, Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a Tokyo throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 70, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Kashima's Shoma Doi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 71, Everaldo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashima.
Throw-in Kashima.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 75, Goal! Shoma Doi equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Yasushi Endo with an assist there.
Free kick Tokyo.
In the minute 76, Adailton (Tokyo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Tokyo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Tokyo.
Kento Misao (Kashima) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Tokyo defenders.
In the minute 80, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Everaldo for Kashima drives towards goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, Adailton (Tokyo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 84, Kenta Hasegawa (Tokyo) is making a fourth substitution, with Hotaka Nakamura replacing Ryoya Ogawa.
Arthur Silva is on a sub for Yojiro Takahagi for Tokyo.
The home team have replaced Leo Silva with Ryota Nagaki. This is the third substitution made today by Zago.
In the minute 85, Kashima's Yasushi Endo gets in a shot on goal at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kashima apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Yasushi Endo. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Jumpei Iida awards Tokyo a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Tokyo.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Ryuji Izumi (Kashima) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Tokyo.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Masato Morishige (Tokyo) gets a yellow card.
At Kashima Soccer Stadium, Diego Oliveira has been yellow-carded for the away team.
